VCardWriter Class Reference

#include <Apoxi/Auxiliary/VCard.hpp>

Collaboration diagram for VCardWriter:

[legend]

Public Member Functions

UINT32 WriteVCard (CHAR *buffer, UINT32 buffer_len, const VCard *vcard)

Detailed Description

VCardWriter dumps the content of a VCard object to a vCard stream.

Shouldn't be used directly. Use the WriteBuffer() function of the VCard class instead.

Member Function Documentation

UINT32 VCardWriter::WriteVCard (  CHAR *  buffer,
UINT32  buffer_len,
const VCard *  vcard
) 
 

WriteVCard writes vCard stream using the values from vcard

Parameters:
buffer the buffer to write to
buffer_len size of the buffer in bytes
vcard vcard object
Returns:
size of the write_buffer used on success, (UINT32) -1 if the write_buffer is to small
